short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes Shopify stores to identify themes and installed apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wonder how your favorite online stores are built? This extension lifts the curtain on e-commerce platforms, with a special focus on Shopify stores.

For Shopify Stores:
1. Identifies premium vs free themes and their names
2. Detects installed apps and integrations
3. Shows internal theme names and style handles
4. Recognizes custom theme implementations

Platform Detection:
1. Shopify
2. BigCommerce
3. Magento (both 1.x and 2.x)
4. WooCommerce
5. Wix

Perfect for:
1. E-commerce developers researching tech stacks
2. Store owners comparing platform setups
3. Digital agencies analyzing competitor builds
4. Anyone curious about how online stores work

Quick, lightweight, and runs entirely in your browser. Just click the icon when browsing any online store to see what's powering it.

Note: Detailed theme and app analysis is currently available for Shopify stores only. Platform detection works across all supported platforms.
